snippet: Ukraine has asked the International Criminal Court to investigate the deaths of civilians on its territory that occurred from Nov. 21, 2013, to Feb. 22, covering the period when more than 100 people were killed during antigovernment protests.
abstract: Ukraine asks International Criminal Court to investigate deaths of civilians on its territory that occurred from November 2013 to February 2014, covering period when more than 100 people were killed during antigovernment protests.
lead_paragraph: Ukraine has asked the International Criminal Court to investigate the deaths of civilians on its territory that occurred from Nov. 21, 2013, to Feb. 22, covering the period when more than 100 people were killed during antigovernment protests.
